tasks.task: Prepare for winter storm in Georgia for homestead and animals
subtasks: Decide if milk or bread is necessary
Discuss with Titus about upcoming weather
Assess the risk of ice storms in Georgia
Prepare animal shelters for inclement weather
Check on animal water sources and prevent ice buildup
Reinforce animal shelters against potential wind damage
Stock up on non-perishable food for animals during power outage
Prepare alternative cooking methods if power outages occur
Secure livestock in case of escape during storm
Create safe walking paths with mulch to avoid slips
Stock up on essential items like batteries and candles for survival
Coordinate with neighbors and community for mutual aid

tasks.task: Stay indoors during severe weather to ensure safety
subtasks: Monitor animals' water and food needs
Check on neighbors and offer assistance where needed

tasks.task: Adapt to changing weather conditions and potential variations in storm type
subtasks: Adjust preparations based on anticipated precipitation type (rain, ice, snow)

tasks.task: Maintain mental and emotional well-being during the storm
subtasks: Plan enjoyable indoor activities to relieve boredom
Encourage confidence and safety in household members
Maintain open communication within the family
